Items.Title: Resolution recognizing November 20th annually as Transgender Day of Remembrance and March 31st annually as Transgender Day of Visibility in the City of New York.

Items.MatterName: Recognizing November 20th annually as Transgender Day of Remembrance and March 31st annually as Transgender Day of Visibility in the City of NY.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on Congress to pass, and the President to sign, the Puerto Rico Self-Determination Act of 2020, H.R. 8113.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Puerto Rico Self-Determination Act of 2020, H.R. 8113.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Ayala and Public Advocate Williams.
